target_sites.name: mlbprediction
target_sites.angle: Analytics, advanced stats (xBA, WAR, xFIP), data-driven

target_sites.name: bestmlbhandicapper
target_sites.angle: Sharp money, expert handicapping, situational angles

news_items.headline: Reds sign 1B Nathaniel Lowe to minors deal, invite to spring training
news_items.description: The Cincinnati Reds have signed veteran first baseman Nathaniel Lowe to a minor league contract with an invite to major league camp in spring training, the team announced.

news_items.headline: Edwin Diaz says playing in WBC an 'easy decision'
news_items.description: Edwin Diaz said it was an "easy decision" to play in the World Baseball Classic despite suffering a knee injury in the 2023 event.

news_items.headline: Marlins win arbitration vs. Calvin Faucher as players go 8-4
news_items.description: The Marlins defeated Calvin Faucher in the final salary arbitration case this year, leaving players with an 8-4 advantage in hearings.

news_items.headline: Diamondbacks, RHP Paul Sewald agree on 1-year deal
news_items.description: The Diamondbacks and reliever Paul Sewald have agreed to terms on a one-year, $1.5 million deal.

news_items.headline: Source: Padres bring in OF Castellanos, pitchers Marquez, Canning
news_items.description: The Padres agreed to several deals Saturday, including outfielder Nick Castellanos, veteran pitcher German Marquez and fellow righty Griffin Canning, a source confirmed to ESPN.

news_items.headline: Zac Gallen's best moments from 2025
news_items.description: Check out some of the best strikeouts from Zac Gallen's 2025 campaign as he signs a new 1-year deal.
